data.text:
Get more with the FRONTIER Mastercard. Coming Winter 2021 card holders will be able to pick one of their fav Frontier animals to be on their credit card.

Vote today & help us choose which 4 animals will be featured & be entered to win 20k Frontier Miles! https://t.co/BjNGZOkoCW https://t.co/mnOvId8n07

Go behind the scenes with Sean Bradshaw, Technical Fellow of Sustainable Propulsion at @prattandwhitney Pratt. Sean talks about the TALON X Low Emissions Combustor and how it lowers pollutants. https://t.co/jlPMbgYYwF

#FrontierAirines #WeArePW #sustainability https://t.co/tJAjOSnKTa

Earn up to 100,000 bonus miles - enough for 10 one-way award tickets! 

You can earn 10,000 miles for every round-trip or two one-way trips on Frontier between 8/4 - 12/31/2021. But hurry, you need to book before 8/30/2021! https://t.co/0F36iQKDmn https://t.co/U6F9as5mni

Here are some helpful tips to make your travel experience care free. https://t.co/7SeHRIvNr6

#CommittedToYou https://t.co/E4P6l3uW0G

data.text:
Some might say our newest animal is a "Thor-toise," as he is able to survive ground temperature exceeding 140 degrees F and is known to live as long as 60 to 80 years.

Say "shello" Welcome our newest tail, Mojave the Desert Tortoise! https://t.co/Fc9zg3yRsN https://t.co/BlVLgA5VrQ

FRIENDS WITH VACCINES FLY FREE + EARN 10,000 BONUS MILES!

For a limited time only, Discount Den Members have exclusive access to our Friends with Vaccines Fly Free sale! Book now: https://t.co/5m42ml5TKc

Plus - earn 10K BONUS MILES. Learn more here: https://t.co/CbWd8mCi1l https://t.co/nkrS6RN9ix

The animal joining our fleet tomorrow equally shares our 💚 of all things green. Can you guess the animal?

Hint: This animal is found in the Mojave and Sonoran Deserts.

Tune back into tomorrow to greet our newest friend! https://t.co/5W9jAW20Az

It's #ColoradoDay today and we're celebrating the beautiful state that we are lucky to call home. Read our Outdoor Guide to Colorado for some of the best bets for things to do and see here! https://t.co/SNZcfWNb3L 

@Colorado @DENAirport @DROAirport @VisitDurango @COSAirport https://t.co/GwXmCBJr7w
